summary: A butler gets elected to the Hungarian parliament where he opposes his master's government.
cast: William Powell|Annabella|Helen Westley|Henry Stephenson|Joseph Schildkraut|J. Edward Bromberg|Nigel Bruce|Lynn Bari|Maurice Cass|Ivan F. Simpson|Alphonse Ethier|Claire Du Brey|Wilfred Lucas|Sidney Bracey|Frank Baker|Eleanor Wesselhoeft|George Davis|Margaret Irving|Carol Adams|Lowden Adams|John Bleifer|Esther Brodelet|Burr Caruth|Glen Cavender|David Cavendish|Edward Cooper|Antonio Filauri|Sydney Jarvis|Edward Keane|Doris Lloyd|Eric Mayne|Paul McVey|Lucille Miller|George Nardelli|Inez Palange|Ruth Peterson|Alexander Pollard|Tom Ricketts|William Sabbot|Sam Savitsky|Bert Sprotte|Count Stefenelli|Iva Stewart|Jack Vlaskin|Stanhope Wheatcroft|Charlotte Wynters
title: La baronesa y el mayordomo
